SETS.LaTeX: \text{Let } i \in \{1, 2, 3, 4\} \text{ represent production lines; } j \in \{1, 2, 3\} \text{ represent devices (smartphones, tablets, laptops).}

VARIABLES.name: x_{1j}
VARIABLES.description: Quantity of device $j$ produced by production line 1

VARIABLES.name: x_{2j}
VARIABLES.description: Quantity of device $j$ produced by production line 2

VARIABLES.name: x_{3j}
VARIABLES.description: Quantity of device $j$ produced by production line 3

VARIABLES.name: x_{4j}
VARIABLES.description: Quantity of device $j$ produced by production line 4

PARAMETERS.name: smartphones_per_hour_1
PARAMETERS.description: Smartphones produced per hour by production line 1

PARAMETERS.name: tablets_per_hour_1
PARAMETERS.description: Tablets produced per hour by production line 1

PARAMETERS.name: laptops_per_hour_1
PARAMETERS.description: Laptops produced per hour by production line 1

PARAMETERS.name: smartphones_per_hour_2
PARAMETERS.description: Smartphones produced per hour by production line 2

PARAMETERS.name: tablets_per_hour_2
PARAMETERS.description: Tablets produced per hour by production line 2

PARAMETERS.name: laptops_per_hour_2
PARAMETERS.description: Laptops produced per hour by production line 2

PARAMETERS.name: smartphones_per_hour_3
PARAMETERS.description: Smartphones produced per hour by production line 3

PARAMETERS.name: tablets_per_hour_3
PARAMETERS.description: Tablets produced per hour by production line 3

PARAMETERS.name: laptops_per_hour_3
PARAMETERS.description: Laptops produced per hour by production line 3

PARAMETERS.name: smartphones_per_hour_4
PARAMETERS.description: Smartphones produced per hour by production line 4

PARAMETERS.name: tablets_per_hour_4
PARAMETERS.description: Tablets produced per hour by production line 4
